name: Thrillville Theme Park
summary: Learn about .PRK files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In the Thrillville series, players manage several theme parks, in which they design and place roller coasters and other attractions. Players unlock new theme parks by successfully managing their current park.

These parks' initial layouts are saved as PRK files. Thrillville games use these files to load a park's default rides and attractions when the player unlocks that park. Players can then modify the park, by building new rides and attractions.

instructions: PRK files are not meant to be opened. Thrillville games load PRK files during gameplay and use them to show theme parks.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
